description:
8.57 aspectralstats
Display frequency domain statistical information about the audio channels.
Statistics are calculated and stored as metadata for each audio channel and for each audio frame.

It accepts the following option:

A list of each metadata key follows:
name: aspectralstats

options.description: Set the window length in samples. Default value is 2048. Allowed range is from 32 to 65536.
options.name: win_size

options.description:
Set window function.

It accepts the following values:

‘rect’
‘bartlett’
‘hann, hanning’
‘hamming’
‘blackman’
‘welch’
‘flattop’
‘bharris’
‘bnuttall’
‘bhann’
‘sine’
‘nuttall’
‘lanczos’
‘gauss’
‘tukey’
‘dolph’
‘cauchy’
‘parzen’
‘poisson’
‘bohman’
‘kaiser’

Default is hann.
options.name: win_func

options.description: Set window overlap. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.5.
options.name: overlap

options.description: Select the parameters which are measured. The metadata keys can be used as flags, default is all which measures everything. none disables all measurement.
options.name: measure
